definition: A process of clearing or evacuating a space, typically used to describe the action of removing people or objects from a particular area due to an emergency, such as a fire, natural disaster, or eviction.

examples.german: Die Räumung des Hauses war erfolgreich.
examples.english: The evacuation of the house was successful.

examples.german: Die Räumung der Straße dauerte mehrere Stunden.
examples.english: The clearing of the street took several hours.

examples.german: Die Räumung des Platzes wurde von der Polizei durchgeführt.
examples.english: The evacuation of the square was carried out by the police.

examples.german: Die Räumung des Gebäudes erfolgte aufgrund eines Brandalarms.
examples.english: The evacuation of the building was due to a fire alarm.

examples.german: Die Räumung der Flüchtlingsunterkunft verlief geordnet.
examples.english: The evacuation of the refugee shelter was orderly.
